item.title: Cloud Security Basics
item.description: First seminar on 24th June 2024, as a seminar at Mumbai University Presentation: docs.google.com I had the honor of delivering a talk at SAKEC, Mumbai University, where I introduced the fundamental concepts of cloud computing. This session delved into the core principles of cloud architecture, service models, and deployment strategies, providing a comprehensive overview of how cloud technology is transforming the IT landscape. Through practical examples and real-world scenarios, I highlighted the benefits of cloud adoption and discussed the key considerations for securing cloud environments.
